subject: Swarm: tie activeAgents to real subagent IDs
description: SwarmCoordinator generates synthetic agentIds that don't match SubagentManager spawn IDs. This breaks cancellation/status cross-referencing. Extend SubagentManager.spawn to return subagentId alongside result (or add spawnWithId), plumb through SwarmCoordinator, and use real subagentId for assignedAgentId/activeAgents tracking.
